transcript.text: Shalom Shalom this is Daniel John Lee
with tor restoration ministries Happy
Passover happy Pesach everyone it is
Monday night April 30th 2014 it is the
14th day of Abib the 14 day ad even when
we are commanded in exodus 12 to eat the
Passover lamb the bitter herbs the
unleavened bread as you can see on my
Passover table here we got all those
things as well as a big old pile of Hara
said there that I always like to have
with my Passover so I just wanted to
wish everyone a very happy Passover 2018
this is a meal that we are commanded to
have all the components on the dish the
lamb the bitter herbs the unleavened
bread the Cara set all of these things
symbolize and point toward Yahshua and
his sacrifice and the deliverance of the
children of Israel from Egypt in some
form or fashion and and they all they
all point to him and glorify Him
so I hope you all had a very wonderful
Passover meal I know I did with my
friends and we just we just now finished
closing out our Passover meal yeah we
had a beautiful meal and read scripture
and he had some crazy worship so now as
Passover the day of Passover comes to an
end as night falls tonight we now go
into a high Sabbath it's the first day
of seven days the first day of
unleavened bread we are now to have all
leaven out of our dwelling place and out
of our out of our cars and only to have
unleavened bread for the next seven days
if we're going to have any bread
products only unleavened bread and not
have any leaven in our meals seven days
and that's what starts tonight so this
first high Sabbath of the year starts
tonight Monday night April thirtieth and
goes through Tuesday May 1st so I hope
you all have a very wonderful high
Sabbath a very wonderful
shabbat shalom as we kick off Passover
week the first day of unleavened bread
I've a very very happy merry Pesach 2018
this is Daniel John Lee with Torah
restoration ministry's website is spirit
tour calm shallow
